articles.author: Shivendra Kumar
articles.title: PB Fintech Q4 Results: Policybazaar parent reports PAT of Rs 60 crore vs loss of Rs 9.34 crore YoY - The Economic Times
articles.description: PB Fintech Q4 Results: The consolidated revenue for the reporting quarter stood at Rs 1089.57 crore, which was up 25.36% over Rs 869.10 crore reported in the year-ago period. For FY24, the PAT improved from a loss of Rs 488 crore to a profit of Rs 64 crore.
articles.content: Online insurance aggregator PB Fintech, which operates Policybazaar, on Tuesday reported a net profit of Rs 60.19 crore for the quarter ended March 31, 2024, as against a loss of Rs 9.34 crore report… [+1889 chars]
